name: Tetris Clone (TUĞRUL SÜBEKCİ)
description:
TETRIS CLONE
  •  I was really curious about puzzle games. Then, I started making Tetris and really enjoyed. I think, most important thing is its algorithm and I liked it so much.
  • This is my first puzzle game experince.
  • Left Arrow/Right Arrow to move left/right, Up Arrow to rotate tetromino and Down Arrow to fall fast.
